column2: Gildan Activewear, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of printwear and branded apparel. The company is headquartered in Montreal, Quebec and currently employs 53,000 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Printwear and Branded Apparel. The Printwear segment designs, manufactures, sources, markets, and distributes undecorated activewear products. The Branded Apparel segment designs, manufactures, sources, markets, and distributes branded family apparel, which includes athletic, casual and dress socks, underwear, activewear, sheer hosiery, legwear, and shapewear products, which are sold to retailers in the United States and Canada. The firm sells its products under various brands, including the Gildan, Gold Toe, Anvil, Comfort Colors, American Apparel, Alstyle, Secret, Silks, Kushyfoot, Secret Silky, Therapy Plus, Peds, and MediPeds brands. The firm distributes its products in printwear markets in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Europe, Asia-Pacific and Latin America.
